title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 405.44 - Validity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 405.44 - Validity

State Regulations

If any clause, sentence, paragraph or section of this

Part shall be adjudged by any court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, such judgment shall not affect, impair or invalidate the remainder thereof, but
shall be confined in its operation to the clause, sentence, paragraph or
section thereof directly involved in the controversy in which such judgment
shall have been rendered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
405.44

Amended

New

York State Register November 13, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 46, eff. 11/13/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
